WorkItem.Description:
Would it possible to configure "indentation" for the TypeScript compiler, I'd like it to use 2 spaces for tabs instead of 4 (the default).

This is really not an issue, but more of an 'enhancement'

 

Thanks

Comments.Message:
You're talking about Visual Studio. Follow this to change it to 2.

Debug -> Options and Settings

The options screen should appear on the left open the "Text Editor" node. Scroll down to "TypeScript" open that node and click on "Tabs" here you can change the indention to 2.
I would also like the compiled output to use 2 spaces instead of 4
